Title: Marshals of Madness
Description:
The n'raqi have long served as the commanders and taskmasters of the Old Gods' forces. Their presence on the field of battle shows that this invasion is a coordinated effort rather than a random outbreak of corruption.

Led by these faceless masters, the chaotic forces of the Old Gods transform into capable military.

We must make it a priority to fell these creatures. Only then might we take the upper hand against N'Zoth.
ObjectivesText: Kill 6 faceless minions of N'Zoth in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
